name: Hana, The Game
description:
Student platformer game based in feudal Japan. Players take on the role of Hana, the young wife of the recently assassinated Shogun on her journey to warn the Emperor of the approaching coup d'etat.

A short game created by Tavis Molyneux, Corey Smith, Adelaine Baltazar, Joel Simmons, Joffre Arteaga and Anthony Cherfan.
